subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Brittany Bock was among 18 players chosen by Coach Pia Sundhage for the United States women’s team that will play the World Cup champion Germany on Oct. 29.
snippet: Brittany Bock was among 18 players chosen by Coach Pia Sundhage for the United States women’s team that will play the World Cup champion Germany on Oct. 29.
